02457   /* class. Caption
02458      desc.
02459          A single line piece of text
02460   */
02461   class Caption : public Ogre::GeneralAllocatedObject
02462   {
02463     
02464    friend class Layer;
02465    
02466    public:
02467     
02468     /*! function. font
02469         desc.
02470             Changes the font to a different Glyph index.
02471         note.
02472              If the font index does not exist, an exception may be thrown.
02473     */
02474     void font(size_t font_index)
02475     {
02476      mGlyphData      = mLayer->_getGlyphData(font_index);
02477      if (mGlyphData == 0)
02478      {
02479        mDirty        = false;
02480    #if GORILLA_USES_EXCEPTIONS == 1
02481        OGRE_EXCEPT( Ogre::Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "Glyph data not found", __FUNC__ );
02482    #else
02483        return;
02484    #endif
02485      }
02486      mDirty = true;
02487      mLayer->_markDirty();
02488     }
02489     /*! function. intersects
02490         desc.
02491             Does a set of coordinates lie within this caption?
02492     */
02493     inline bool intersects(const Ogre::Vector2& coordinates) const
02494     {
02495      return ((coordinates.x >= mLeft && coordinates.x <= mLeft + mWidth) && (coordinates.y >= mTop && coordinates.y <= mTop + mHeight));
02496     }
02497     
02498     /*! function. top
02499         desc.
02500             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02501     */
02502     Ogre::Real  left() const
02503     {
02504      return mLeft;
02505     }
02506 
02507     /*! function. top
02508         desc.
02509             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02510         note.
02511              If the TextAlignment is Right Aligned, then this will be the right-side of the last character drawn (with in width limits).
02512              If the TextAlignment is Centre Aligned, then this will be the center of the drawn text drawn (with in width limits).
02513     */
02514     void  left(const Ogre::Real& left)
02515     {
02516      mLeft = left;
02517      mDirty = true;
02518      mLayer->_markDirty();
02519     }
02520 
02521     /*! function. top
02522         desc.
02523             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02524     */
02525     Ogre::Real  top() const
02526     {
02527      return mTop;
02528     }
02529 
02530     /*! function. top
02531         desc.
02532             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02533     */
02534     void  top(const Ogre::Real& top)
02535     {
02536      mTop = top;
02537      mDirty = true;
02538      mLayer->_markDirty();
02539     }
02540     
02541     /*! function. size
02542         desc.
02543             Set the maximum width and height of the text can draw into.
02544     */
02545     void size(const Ogre::Real& width, const Ogre::Real& height)
02546     {
02547      mWidth = width;
02548      mHeight = height;
02549      mDirty = true;
02550      mLayer->_markDirty();
02551     }
02552 
02553     /*! function. width
02554         desc.
02555             Get the maximum width of the text can draw into.
02556     */
02557     Ogre::Real width() const
02558     {
02559      return mWidth;
02560     }
02561     
02562     /*! function. width
02563         desc.
02564             Set the maximum width of the text can draw into.
02565     */
02566     void  width(const Ogre::Real& width)
02567     {
02568      mWidth = width;
02569      mDirty = true;
02570      mLayer->_markDirty();
02571     }
02572     
02573     /*! function. height
02574         desc.
02575             Get the maximum height of the text can draw into.
02576     */
02577     Ogre::Real height() const
02578     {
02579      return mHeight;
02580     }
02581     
02582     /*! function. height
02583         desc.
02584             Set the maximum height of the text can draw into.
02585     */
02586     void  height(const Ogre::Real& height)
02587     {
02588      mHeight = height;
02589      mDirty = true;
02590      mLayer->_markDirty();
02591     }
02592     
02593     /*! function. caption
02594         desc.
02595             Get the text indented to show.
02596     */
02597     Ogre::String  text() const
02598     {
02599      return mText;
02600     }
02601     
02602     /*! function. alignment
02603         desc.
02604             Set the text to show.
02605     */
02606     void  text(const Ogre::String& text)
02607     {
02608      mText = text;
02609      mDirty = true;
02610      mLayer->_markDirty();
02611     }
02612     
02613     /*! function. alignment
02614         desc.
02615             Get the alignment of text.
02616     */
02617     TextAlignment align() const
02618     {
02619      return mAlignment;
02620     }
02621     
02622     /*! function. alignment
02623         desc.
02624             Set the alignment of text.
02625     */
02626     void  align(const TextAlignment& alignment)
02627     {
02628      mAlignment = alignment;
02629      mDirty = true;
02630      mLayer->_markDirty();
02631     }
02632     
02633     /*! function. alignment
02634         desc.
02635             Get the vertical alignment of text.
02636     */
02637     VerticalAlignment vertical_align() const
02638     {
02639      return mVerticalAlign;
02640     }
02641     
02642     /*! function. vertical_align
02643         desc.
02644             Set the vertical alignment of text.
02645     */
02646     void  vertical_align(const VerticalAlignment& alignment)
02647     {
02648      mVerticalAlign = alignment;
02649      mDirty = true;
02650      mLayer->_markDirty();
02651     }
02652     
02653     /*! function. clipped_left_index
02654         desc.
02655             Get the index (character position), of the first character that could not be drawn due to the limits
02656             of the width of the text, to the left.
02657         return.
02658             size_t -- The index if the first clipped character, or std::string::npos if there was no clipping and
02659                       the text was drawn fully within the given space.
02660     */
02661     size_t  clipped_left_index() const
02662     {
02663      return mClippedLeftIndex;
02664     }
02665     
02666     /*! function. clipped_right_index
02667         desc.
02668             Get the index (character position), of the first character that could not be drawn due to the limits
02669             of the width of the text, to the right.
02670         return.
02671             size_t -- The index if the first clipped character, or std::string::npos if there was no clipping and
02672                       the text was drawn fully within the given space.
02673     */
02674     size_t  clipped_right_index() const
02675     {
02676      return mClippedRightIndex;
02677     }
02678     
02679     /*! function. colour
02680         desc.
02681             Get the text colour.
02682     */
02683     Ogre::ColourValue  colour() const
02684     {
02685      return mColour;
02686     }
02687     
02688     /*! function. colour
02689         desc.
02690             Set the text colour.
02691     */
02692     void  colour(const Ogre::ColourValue& colour)
02693     {
02694      mColour = colour;
02695      mDirty = true;
02696      mLayer->_markDirty();
02697     }
02698     
02699     /*! function. colour
02700         desc.
02701             Set the text colour.
02702     */
02703     void  colour(Gorilla::Colours::Colour colour)
02704     {
02705      mColour = webcolour(colour);
02706      mDirty = true;
02707      mLayer->_markDirty();
02708     }
02709     
02710     /*! function. background
02711         desc.
02712             Get the background colour
02713     */
02714     Ogre::ColourValue  background() const
02715     {
02716      return mBackground;
02717     }
02718     
02719     /*! function. background
02720         desc.
02721             Set the background colour
02722     */
02723     void  background(const Ogre::ColourValue& background)
02724     {
02725      mBackground = background;
02726      mDirty = true;
02727      mLayer->_markDirty();
02728     }
02729     
02730     /*! function. background
02731         desc.
02732             Set the background colour
02733     */
02734     void  background(Gorilla::Colours::Colour background)
02735     {
02736      if (background == Colours::None)
02737       mBackground.a = 0;
02738      else
02739       mBackground = webcolour(background);
02740      mDirty = true;
02741      mLayer->_markDirty();
02742     }
02743     
02744     /*! function. no_background 
02745         desc.
02746             Don't draw the background.
02747         note.
02748             This just sets the background colour alpha to zero. Which on the next
02749             draw tells Caption to skip over drawing the background.
02750     */
02751     void  no_background()
02752     {
02753      mBackground.a = 0;
02754      mDirty = true;
02755      mLayer->_markDirty();
02756     }
02757 
02758     /*! function. _redraw
02759         desc.
02760             Redraw the text.
02761         note.
02762             This shouldn't be need to be called by the user.
02763     */
02764     void               _redraw();
02765     
02766    protected:
02767     
02768     void               _calculateDrawSize(Ogre::Vector2& size);
02769     
02770     Caption(Ogre::uint glyphDataIndex, Ogre::Real left, Ogre::Real top, const Ogre::String& caption, Layer* parent);
02771     
02772    ~Caption() {}
02773     
02774    protected:
02775     
02776     Layer*                mLayer;
02777     GlyphData*            mGlyphData;
02778     Ogre::Real            mLeft, mTop, mWidth, mHeight;
02779     TextAlignment         mAlignment;
02780     VerticalAlignment     mVerticalAlign;
02781     Ogre::String          mText;
02782     Ogre::ColourValue     mColour, mBackground;
02783     bool                  mDirty;
02784     buffer<Vertex>        mVertices;
02785     size_t                mClippedLeftIndex, mClippedRightIndex;
02786     
02787   };
02788   
02789   /* class. Caption
02790      desc.
02791          A multi-line collection of text formatted by a light markup language, that can
02792          switch colours, change to monospace and insert sprites directly into the text.
02793   */
02794   class MarkupText : public Ogre::GeneralAllocatedObject
02795   {
02796     
02797    friend class Layer;
02798    
02799    public:
02800     
02801     /*! function. top
02802         desc.
02803             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02804     */
02805     Ogre::Real  left() const
02806     {
02807      return mLeft;
02808     }
02809 
02810     /*! function. top
02811         desc.
02812             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02813         note.
02814              If the TextAlignment is Right Aligned, then this will be the right-side of the last character drawn (with in width limits).
02815              If the TextAlignment is Centre Aligned, then this will be the center of the drawn text drawn (with in width limits).
02816     */
02817     void  left(const Ogre::Real& left)
02818     {
02819      mLeft = left;
02820      mDirty = true;
02821      mTextDirty = true;
02822      mLayer->_markDirty();
02823     }
02824 
02825     /*! function. top
02826         desc.
02827             Get where the text should be drawn vertically.
02828     */
02829     Ogre::Real  top() const
02830     {
02831      return mTop;
02832     }
02833 
02834     /*! function. top
02835         desc.
02836             Set where the text should be drawn vertically.
02837     */
02838     void  top(const Ogre::Real& top)
02839     {
02840      mTop = top;
02841      mDirty = true;
02842      mTextDirty = true;
02843      mLayer->_markDirty();
02844     }
02845     
02846     
02847     /*! function. size
02848         desc.
02849             Set the maximum width and height of the text can draw into.
02850     */
02851     void size(const Ogre::Real& width, const Ogre::Real& height)
02852     {
02853      mWidth = width;
02854      mHeight = height;
02855      mDirty = true;
02856      mLayer->_markDirty();
02857     }
02858

02860         desc.
02861             Get the maximum width of the text can draw into.

02897     }

02899     /*! function. maxTextWidth
02900         desc.
02901             Get the width of the text once drawn.
02902     */
02903     Ogre::Real maxTextWidth()
02904     {
02905      _calculateCharacters();
02906      return mMaxTextWidth;
02907     }
02908

02910         desc.
02911             Get the text indented to show.

02919         desc.
02920             Set the text to show.
02921     */
02922     void  text(const Ogre::String& text)
02923     {
02924      mText = text;
02925      mTextDirty = true;
02926      mDirty = true;
02927      mLayer->_markDirty();
02928     }

02930     /*! function. background
02931         desc.
02932             Get the background colour
02933     */
02934     Ogre::ColourValue  background() const

02940         desc.

02943     void  background(const Ogre::ColourValue& background)
02944     {
02945      mBackground = background;
02946      mDirty = true;
02947      mLayer->_markDirty();
02948     }
02949     
02950     /*! function. background
02951         desc.
02952             Set the background colour
02953     */
02954     void  background(Gorilla::Colours::Colour background)
02955     {
02956      if (background == Colours::None)
02957       mBackground.a = 0;
02958      else
02959       mBackground = webcolour(background);
02960      mDirty = true;
02961      mLayer->_markDirty();
02962     }

02965         desc.
02966             Redraw the text.
02967         note.
02968             This shouldn't be need to be called by the user.
02969     */
02970     void               _redraw();
